text: Romolo Tavoni (30 January 1926 â€“ 20 December 2020) was an Italian sports executive. He directed the racing team Scuderia Ferrari during the 1959 Formula One season. He was born in Formigine, Kingdom of Italy. Tavoni died on 20 December 2020 at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian businesspeople
title: Romolo Tavoni
